active.title: Whispers in the Dark
active.description: While scavenging in the tunnels, you hear faint cries for help echoing through the vents. A survivor is trapped in a collapsed section nearby. You must navigate the maze-like tunnels and rescue them before the area becomes overrun with zombies drawn by the noise.

objectives.description: Locate the trapped survivor by following their cries through the tunnel system.
Clear the debris blocking the survivor's path or find an alternate route to reach them.
Escort the survivor back to a safe location, avoiding or eliminating any zombies along the way.

rewards.description: The survivor shares a stash of medical supplies as thanks.
The survivor reveals the location of a nearby safehouse with working generators.

active.failure_consequences: If you take too long, the survivor is either killed by zombies or suffocates under the rubble. The noise also attracts a horde to your current location.
active.follow_up: The survivor may join your group or ask for help securing the safehouse they mentioned.
active.notes: Listen carefully for changes in the cries' direction—some tunnels may be unstable or blocked. The survivor is injured and will slow movement during the escort phase.

active.title: Drip in the Dark
active.description: The constant dripping in the tunnels is driving you mad. Find the source of the leak and scavenge any usable materials from the area.

objectives.description: Locate the source of the dripping sound in the tunnels
Scavenge at least 1 usable item (e.g., scrap metal, plastic container, or cloth)

rewards.description: Small water container (if plastic is found)

active.failure_consequences: The dripping continues to erode your sanity, giving a temporary penalty to perception checks until you leave the tunnels
active.follow_up: Discovering the leak's source might reveal a crack leading to another section of the tunnels
active.notes: The dripping is coming from a specific section of tunnel - follow the sound. Zombies are unlikely in this area due to the confined space.

active.title: Emergency Light Repairs
active.description: The flickering emergency lights in the tunnels are failing, leaving you vulnerable in the dark. Scavenge for parts and craft a makeshift power regulator to stabilize the lights before they go out completely.

objectives.description: Find 3 broken electronics (e.g., radios, circuit boards) in the tunnels or nearby areas.
Craft a power regulator using the scavenged parts and a basic toolkit.
Install the regulator in the tunnel's emergency light control panel.

rewards.description: Stable lighting in the tunnels, reducing the risk of zombie ambushes in the dark.
Leftover electronic parts for future crafting.

active.failure_consequences: The lights fail entirely, forcing you to navigate the tunnels in darkness. Zombies become harder to detect, and the risk of ambush increases significantly.
active.follow_up: A survivor group may notice the restored lights and attempt to contact you, leading to a new alliance or conflict.
active.notes: Broken electronics are often found in maintenance rooms or abandoned utility crates. Zombies are less active in the tunnels during storms, making it a safer time to scavenge.
